channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1750; 08:59PM; 1265 N Lyman Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YdfvY0; #EastHollywood; It took 32 firefighters 17 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames consuming a boarded-up residential structure (duplex? condo?). Thankfully, no one was found inside of the structure, and there were no reported injuries. The cause remains under active investigation.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E20 E220 E227 E235 E35 E450 E6 EM11 RA82 RA827 T20 T27 T35; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1750; 08:42PM; 1265 N Lyman Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YdfvY0; #EastHollywood; Vacant two-story duplex with fire showing from the second floor (site of previous burn). Offensive mode.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC5 E20 E220 E235 E35 E6 RA82 RA827 T20 T35; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0813; 12:18PM; 6303 S Overhill Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3S46cat; #HydePark; Firefighters responded to a two-story multi-family residential structure (four-plex?) with smoke showing from the second floor. The first 26 firefighters extinguished flames inside of one unit in 15 minutes, without injury. Cause under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 BC4 E205 E266 E295 E5 E66 E95 RA867 RA95 SQ21 T5 T66 T95; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Structure Fire; INC#1476; 08:05PM; 3726 S Sawtelle Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3U2XlZc; #MarVista; The adult female occupant of the apartment involved with fire, is being taken to an area hospital by LAFD Paramedics in fair condition, following her exposure to copious smoke from the fire. There are no other injuries reported. The cause of the fire remains under investigation.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 E263 E292 E43 E59 E62 RA43 RA62 SO1 T63 T92; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1476; 07:48PM; 3726 S Sawtelle Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3U2XlZc; #MarVista; First arriving 20 LAFD Firefighters, assisted by neighboring Culver City Fire Department in automatic aid, made an aggressive and well-coordinated attack on the flames, extinguishing the fire (in what is now described as a *three-story* apartment building, of two occupied floors over parking) in just 11 minutes. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 E263 E292 E43 E59 E62 RA43 RA62 SO1 T63 T92 + Culver City FD E41 E43; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1476; 07:37PM; 3726 S Sawtelle Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3U2XlZc; #MarVista; PRELIM: Transitional fire attack on a two-Story apartments over parking with heavy fire in one unit on the first floor.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 E263 E292 E43 E59 E62 RA43 RA62 T63 T92; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0579; 10:54AM; 7260 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3O1slF3; #Tujunga; First arriving 14 LAFD Firefighters took just 16 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire within the one upstairs motel room of fire origin at the Galaxy Motel, preventing flames from extending into the attic. One adult male civilian who sustained smoke inhalation has been transported by LAFD Paramedics to an area hospital in undetermined condition. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC11 BC12 BC14 CM40 CM42 E24 E260 E274 E289 E77 E89 E98 EM14 RA74 RA77 RA874 T60 T74 T89; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0579; 10:38AM; 7260 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3O1slF3; #Tujunga; PRELIM: Fire in one upstairs unit at a two-story motel.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC11 BC12 BC14 CM40 CM42 E24 E260 E274 E289 E77 E89 E98 EM14 RA74 RA77 RA874 T60 T74 T89; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#1534; 08:30PM; 1545 N Hobart Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RWsVoE; #EastHollywood; The two missing pet canines have been found by Firefighters, and appear unharmed. They are being medically assessed and comfortably cared for by LAFD crews at the scene. The man taken to the area hospital appears to have unspecified non-life threatening injuries. The fire cause remains under investigation.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E220 E227 E235 E27 E41 E52 E82 EM11 EM14 RA52 RA56 RA82 RA835 SO1 T20 T27 T35; CH7; 14; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1534; 07:56PM; 1545 N Hobart Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RWsVoE; #EastHollywood; First arriving 30 LAFD Firefighters took just 19 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire within one unit on the third floor of a four-story modern center-hallway style apartment building (three occupied floors over parking). One adult male civilian with unspecified injury is now being transported to an area hospital by LAFD Paramedics in undetermined condition. LAFD Firefighters are continuing their systematic search of the fire unit and smoke charged hallways for two missing pet canines, as they guide several building occupants down stairways to fresh air, and assist other residents in sheltering in place within their unthreatened apartment units. The fire cause is under investigation.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E220 E227 E235 E27 E41 E52 E82 EM11 EM14 RA52 RA56 RA82 RA835 SO1 T20 T27 T35; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey
